titleStmt.title: Ane new ballet set out be ane fugitiue Scottisman that fled out of Paris at this lait murther.
titleStmt.author: Sempill, Robert, 1530?-1595.

notesStmt.note: On the St. Bartholomew massacre. Cf. STC.
Verse: "Now Katherine de Medicis hes maid sic a byis ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
